prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with sharp blades for arms and vibrant green wings.
Imagine a flying Pokemon that uses its speed and agility to outmaneuver opponents.
Generate a creature resembling a grasshopper with a sleek body and fierce demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a predator with striking yellow and green colors.
Show me a bug-type Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a martial arts fighting style.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a stealthy insect, ready to strike with its sharp claws.
Give me a Pokemon with a mix of beauty and danger, showcasing its impressive wingspan.
